# Draft:Warm (Ariana Grande song)

"Warm" is a song by American singer-songwriter Ariana Grande from Eternal Sunshine Deluxe: Brighter Days Ahead, the reissue of her seventh studio album, Eternal Sunshine (2024). It was released as a promotional single through Republic Records on September 4, 2025. On the same date, a 7-inch vinyl of "Dandelion" was released, with "Warm" as its B-side. The song was written and produced by Grande, Max Martin, and Oscar Görres.
Background
"Warm" was first released on March 28, 2025 as part of Eternal Sunshine Deluxe: Brighter Days Ahead, the deluxe edition of Grande's seventh studio album Eternal Sunshine, and was then released on the B-side of "Dandelion" on 7-inch vinyl on September 4, 2025.
